ygData.subject: Re: Still kinda dense on specialization, sorry.
ygData.messageBody:
OK!

Mr. J Daniels


On Wed, 30 Jun 1999, Kris Becan wrote:

> From: "Kris Becan" <phonic@...>
>
> Buffing is Abjuration, Healing is Alteration!
>
> **********************
> Human Cleric
> Ramsess De'Vizier
> Rallos Zek
> **********************
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Mr. J Daniels <warpig@...>
> To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
> Sent: Wednesday, June 30, 1999 9:48 AM
> Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Still kinda dense on specialization, sorry.
>
>
> > From: "Mr. J Daniels" <warpig@...>
> >
> > It is? Hrm I could of swore buffing was alteration as well. I'll have to
> > re-check my lists.
> >
> > Mr. J Daniels
> >
> >
> > On Wed, 30 Jun 1999 errors-200561-243-warpig=one.net@onelist.com wrote:
> >
> > > From: I.G <shadowtg1@...>
> > >
> > > healing is alteration but buffing is abjuradation.
> > >
> > > Jaxim
> > >
> > >
> > > >From: "Dan Harmon" <deharmon@...>
> > > >Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> > > >To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
> > > >Subject: [EQ-Clerics] Still kinda dense on specialization, sorry.
> > > >Date: Wed, 30 Jun 1999 09:44:09 -0400
> > > >
> > > >From: "Dan Harmon" <deharmon@...>
> > > >
> > > >I understand what it is, but have a couple questions.
> > > >
> > > >I'm a lvl 13. All my casting is at lvl65. If I understand it
> correctly, I
> > > >can't even specialize until lvl 30, right? By that time ALL my magic
> skill
> > > >levels will be at 150.
> > > >
> > > >So if I specialize (I believe alteration IS the healing/buffing one) at
> lvl
> > > >30, what happens? I'm thinking that my alteration will continue to go
> up,
> > > >but the other 3 or 4 will suddenly take a 100 level dive back to lvl
> 50?
> > > >
> > > >I'm not bitching, I just haven't decided whether or not I want to do
> it.
> > > >Thank god it'll take me a minimum of 2 more months before I get to lvl
> 30 &
> > > >apparently have to worry about making that decision. :)
> > > >
